prodNameC: 宙斯巨細胞病毒免疫球蛋白M酵素連結免疫吸收分析檢測系統
prodNameE: ZEUS CMV IgM ELISA TEST SYSTEM
ingredientsDesc: 1.  Plate. 96 wells configured in twelve 1x8-well strips coated with inactivated CMV (strain AD169) antigen.2.  Conjugate. Conjugated (horseradish peroxidase) goat anti-human IgM (μ chain specific).3.  Positive Control (Human Serum). One, 0.35 ml vial with a red cap.4.  Calibrator (Human Serum). One, 0.5 ml vial with a blue cap.5.  Negative Control (Human Serum). One, 0.35 ml vial with a green cap.6.  Sample Diluent. One 30 ml bottle (blue cap) containing Tween-20, bovine serum albumin, phosphate-buffered-saline, and goat anti-human IgG (γ-chain specific), (pH 7.2 ± 0.2).7.  TMB: One 15 ml amber bottle (amber cap) containing ,3’,5,5’-tetramethylbenzidine (TMB). Ready to use. Contains DMSO ≦15% (w).8.  Stop solution: one 15 ml bottle (red cap) containing 1M H2SO4, 0.7M HCl. 9.  Wash buffer concentrate (10X): dilute 1 part concentrate + 9 parts deionized or distilled water. One 100 ml bottle (clear cap) containing a 10X concentrated phosphate-buffered-saline and Tween-20 solution (blue solution).
applicantAddr: 台北市信義區松德路７４號８樓
efficacy: 偵測人類血清中的巨細胞病毒(CMV)IgM抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
